availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Native of Germany. Married to Agnes Egloff. Father of Michael Egloff, John Egloff, Jacob Egloff, Robert Egloff, Caroline Egloff, Mary Egloff, and C. M. Egloff. Laborer in Hamilton County, Ohio, in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Ohio, Hamilton County, Green and Delhi Township, District 68, p. 488. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 9. KYR-0001-029-0249. KYR-0001-029-0251.
